caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. RICHARDO SALAS, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Three.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Walla Walla County, No. 91-1-00206-9, Donald W. Schacht, J., entered October 2, 1991.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Sweeney, J., concurred in by Thompson, A.C.J., and Munson, J.
